name: Mercku
0:
”Alexa, ask my router to find my iPhone.”
”Alexa, ask my router to turn ON Guest Wi-Fi.”
”Alexa, ask my router to turn OFF Guest Wi-Fi.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my router
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa skills, you can control your Wi-Fi with your voice at home or in the office. With this skill, you can look up any of your devices, or turn on guest Wi-Fi when a guest is visiting, all with a simple voice command.
what do you need: A Mercku router and Mercku app (IOS or Android) are required to use this skill. You need to create a Mercku account and bind the Mercku router device under the Mercku account.
What do you need to do: You can download the <Mercku> App on your mobile phone. To enable this skill, please log in to your account in the Mercku app, select Voice Control in the settings, and click the link to Alexa for authorization; when your Mercku account is successfully linked with Alexa, you can ask Alexa at your home or office which Mercku Mesh your device is connected to, provided that your phone or laptop is connected to Mercku Wi-Fi. you can say: “Alexa, ask my router to find Device’s Name on Mesh Name” When you want to turn guest Wi-Fi on/off, you can say: “Alexa, ask my router to turn ON Mesh Name’s Guest Wi-Fi. Alexa, ask my router to turn OFF Mesh Name’s Guest Wi-Fi”
